Class Room

  • java.lang.Object

          • za.ac.mandela.WRPV301.Capstone.Map.Location.Room
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Room
extends MapLocation
    Concrete extension of the MapLocation class that can hold items and mobs
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

               MapLocation.Material floorMaterial,

               MapLocation.Lighting lighting)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        row - the grid row coordinate of this Room
        column - the grid column coordinate of this Room
        floorMaterial - the MapLocation.Material of the floor of the current location
        wallMaterial - the MapLocation.Material of the wall of the current location
        lighting - the MapLocation.Lighting of this Room
